    public abstract class QATestEnvironment
extends Object
implements TestEnvironment
    A base class for tests to be run by the harness. It implements the org.apache.river.qa.harness.TestEnvironment interface. Minimal implementations for construct and teardown are provided. Subclasses of this class are responsible for implementing the org.apache.river.qa.harness.Test interface run method, and may override construct and teardown to add test specific initialization and cleanup operations.

    A protected logger is instantiated by this class for use by subclasses, with the logger name org.apache.river.qa.harness.test.

    • Method Detail

      • assertion

        public void assertion(boolean condition,
                      String failureMsg)
               throws TestException
        Mostly mimics the behavior of the assert keyword. If condition is true, the method returns silently. If condition is false, the method throws TestException with the detail message of failureMsg.
        Parameters:
        condition - the condition to evaluate
        failureMsg - the exception message to provide
        Throws:
        TestException - if condition is false

      • getConfig

        public QAConfig getConfig()

        Returns:
        the harness QAConfig object

      • construct

        public Test construct(QAConfig config)
               throws Exception
        This method is called by the MasterTest immediately before the run method is called. Override this method to implement test specific construct code. This method:
        • saves a reference to config
        • starts the class server identified by the serviceName "qaClassServer" if the config value named org.apache.river.qa.harness.runkitserver is true (the default)
        • starts the class server identified by the serviceName "jiniClassServer" if the config value named org.apache.river.qa.harness.runjiniserver is true (the default)

        In the majority of cases this method will be overridden. The first action taken by the method should be a call to super.construct(sysConfig).

        Specified by:
        construct in interface TestEnvironment
        Parameters:
        config - the test properties
        Returns:
        Test to run.
        Throws:
        Exception - if any failure occurs during construct

      • tearDown

        public void tearDown()
        This method is called by the MasterTest immediately after the run method returns. Override this method to implement test specific cleanup code. This method cancels all tracked leases, destroys all services that were started by the AdminManager, and sends a TeardownRequest to all participating SlaveTests.

        If this method is overridden, the overriding method should include a call to super.teardown(). In most cases, this will be done as the final action of the overriding method, since test specific cleanup may depend on access to services destroyed by this method.

        Specified by:
        tearDown in interface TestEnvironment

      • trackLease

        public void trackLease(net.jini.core.lease.Lease lease)
        Track a lease for automatic cancellation when the test ends.
        Parameters:
        lease - the Lease to add to the tracking array

      • cancelTrackedLeases

        public void cancelTrackedLeases()
        Cancel all Leases that have been tracked by the caller. UnknownLeaseExceptions are silently ignored. RemoteExceptions cause an error message to be written to the log. In all cases, all of the tracked leases are discarded.

      • forceThreadDump

        public void forceThreadDump()

        Returns:
        the manager
